title: As Russia invades Ukraine, Moscow battles big tech to control the narrative - Economic Times
content:
1. As Russia invades Ukraine, Moscow battles big tech to control the narrative  Economic Times
  2. 10 Things in Tech: Social networks take action  Business Insider India
  3. Facebook, Apple and other tech giants face rising pressure over Ukraine  Livemint
  4. US Tech Companies Under Pressure To Pick A Side As Russia Invades Ukraine  NDTV
  5. How major tech companies are reacting to the Russia-Ukraine conflict  Moneycontrol.com
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: For the tech companies, the stand-off is the latest step in an ongoing confrontation with Russia where platforms risk government-imposed restrictions in the country as it seeks to censor dissidents while protecting state-run media.
